item.title: Hugo
item.description: It took some time, but after the release of this really helpful Luke Smith’s tutorial on Hugo I was finally able to port my old site to this framework. I must say that, although most of the process was an easy rewriting of what I already had, the seemingly simple navigation bar was by far the most laborious thing to make. First, because I had to find out how to add non-section pages to the “section menu for lazy bloggers,” which later I realized had to be added manually in the config file. And second, because I wasn’t able to keep the highlighting of the selected menu item within section’s posts (luckily I found a solution). But now that everything is working properly I can finally look foward to implement some kind of interactive gallery to the Art section (maybe this is the time to learn JavaScript).
